Rooms.Name: A narrow terrace north of the temple
A sandy bend before the east gate
A cluster of trees before the west gate

Objects.Name: noose death
Objects.Description: A bit of sinister-looking coiled rope is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its a thick rope coiled into a fatal knot.  Feeling like suicide today?

Objects.Name: kaleidoscope light
Objects.Description: A kaleidoscope is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a tiny thing, and brightly colored.  While showing you a fantasy swirlof colors away from Mirror|rorriM Mud, here it shows you the real world.

Objects.Name: tunic gold
Objects.Description: A frayed golden tunic lies crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's thin and frayed at more than just the seams.  Since you have beenwearing this your whole life before entering your discipline, it may be time foran improvement.

Objects.Name: black leggings pants
Objects.Description: A pair of black leggings has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They are pitch black and merely a thin covering.

Objects.Name: boots leather
Objects.Description: A pair of old leather boots are here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They are close to wearing holes at the toes and the heels.

Objects.Name: dagger black
Objects.Description: A tiny black dagger has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This tiny dagger serves well for around town and the neighboring village.The blade, however, is small and dull.

Objects.Name: staff gnarled
Objects.Description: A thin gnarled staff has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The staff is carved from holly wood, and serves well for around town and theneighboring village.  You might want to consider a stronger weapon as time goesby, however.

Objects.Name: mace iron
Objects.Description: An iron mace is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is wrought from strong iron, but small and slightly rusty.  It serves wellfor around town and the neighboring village, but as time goes by you might wantto consider trying something heavier.

Objects.Name: sword short
Objects.Description: A short sword is lying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The blade is dull, but it serves well for around town and the neighboringvillage.

Objects.Name: candelabra candle
Objects.Description: A candelabra glows dimly with a golden light.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Thirty tiny black candles shine with a golden glow.  At the base is anengraving of one circle partially obscured by another.

Objects.Name: water fountain marble black water
Objects.Description: A black marble fountain flows with a clear water.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The circular fountain is carved from black marble from the mines below thetown.  The water inside looks sweet to drink.

Objects.Name: axe severance
Objects.Description: A bloody axe has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This massive weapon takes much of your strength to carry.  It would like tokill again, for the blood of the last victim has just dried on the blade.

Objects.Name: gold vault pile atm
Objects.Description: A huge pile of gold is guarded by a magical force.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the treasury of Sundhaven.  It is, of course, guarded by a magicalprotective shield against greedy intruders.

Objects.Name: quesadilla food
Objects.Description: A quesadilla is here, hot and steaming.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks deliciously hot and spicy, a Maynards specialty!

Objects.Name: coffee brewer drink coffee
Objects.Description: A coffee brewer purcolates in the corner of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The smells of brewing coffee coming from this rouse you from any numb-mindedness and cause your mouth to water.

Objects.Name: rose gold black
Objects.ShortDescription: a golden rose with black leaves and stem
Objects.Description: A golden rose with leaves and stem of black is growing here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A dark stem crowned with golden petals, it smells of warm summer winds.

Objects.Name: coffee iced cappuccino drink coffee
Objects.Description: A foamy iced cappuccino is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A clear glass is filled with ice, espresso, steamed milk and milk foam.  Itlooks irresistable.

Objects.Name: coffee irish cream latte drink coffee
Objects.Description: A hot latte is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a tall glass of high-caffeine espresso, steamed milk, milk foam, andirish cream.  Mmmm!

Objects.Name: coffee black cup drink coffee
Objects.Description: A black cup of coffee rests here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Who doesn't need one of these now and then?  How about very often?

Objects.Name: tea cup drink hot tea
Objects.Description: A cup of hot tea is resting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It comes in a slightly ornamented porceline cup, and looks to be brewedmostly of chamomile.

Objects.Name: ale rogue brew ale
Objects.Description: The mascot brew of the assassins guild is resting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It comes in a tall pewter flask engraved with a black naga.

Objects.Name: local speciality black adder drink local
Objects.Description: A black metal flask is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A black metal flask engraved with a coiled snake and filled with dark alethat looks very inviting.

Objects.Name: whisky shot drink whisky
Objects.Description: A shot of whisky emits an alluring scent from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The scent stings your nose pleasantly.

Objects.Name: victim sandwich food
Objects.Description: The specialty sandwich of the Nightbreak Cafe is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: What does the assassins guild do with all those corpses left over from aday's work?  Well, now you know.

Objects.Name: firebreather mug flames drink firebreather
Objects.ShortDescription: a black mug filled with leaping flames
Objects.Description: A large black mug rimming with flames sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a wide, black mug filled with liquid of a fiery color.  The side isengraved with a roaring dragon.

Objects.Name: beer mug cold drink beer
Objects.Description: The air is condensing on a cold mug of beer.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a cold pewter mug, dented from being banged on tables repeatedly.

Objects.Name: wine keg wine
Objects.Description: A keg of wine rests on the floor.

Objects.Name: wine flask leather drink red wine
Objects.Description: A flask of red wine has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The flask is gray and filled, or once filled, perhaps, with red wine.

Objects.Name: roast rabbit food
Objects.Description: A tasty-looking roast is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its a savory garlic rabbit roast.

Objects.Name: stew dragon pot food
Objects.Description: A pot of delicious stew is steaming away.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a small black cauldron of steaming meat stew.  The few scalesremaining tell you this was once a breathing dragon.  Despite its grislyappearance, it smells delicious.

Objects.Name: bread rye food
Objects.Description: A bread baked from rye is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its a round bread dotted with black rye.  It smells good to eat.

Objects.Name: cake saffron food
Objects.ShortDescription: a cake baked from wild saffron
Objects.Description: A cake baked from wild saffron is resting at your feet.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a round tan-colored cake, still hot from the oven.

Objects.Name: pastry blackberry food
Objects.Description: A sticky black pastry is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its sticky with sugar and looks delicious.  Hobbit specialty.

Objects.Name: dish pad tai food
Objects.Description: A spicy dish of Thai food is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The plate is hot to the touch, and the mixture of noodles and vegetables lookspicy and delicious.

Objects.Name: sack leather deer
Objects.Description: A strapped leather sack has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The hardy deer leather sack has straps to allow slinging over the shoulder.

Objects.Name: torch light
Objects.Description: A torch is lying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Its a short, wooden torch.  It's um, flammable.

Objects.Name: quill black pen
Objects.Description: A black inky feather is lying nearby.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A slender dark feather rises from an ink pen.

Objects.Name: paper
Objects.Description: A piece of paper is fluttering in the wind.

Objects.Name: lamp copper light
Objects.Description: A lamp glints copper in the faint light.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a small, dented lamp, forged from copper.

Objects.Name: sword quartz
Objects.Description: A sword with a pale quartz hilt has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a long, slender-tapered sword with a carved hilt of white quartz.

Objects.Name: dagger crescent mithril
Objects.Description: A dagger with a blade curved like a crescent is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a silver-colored dagger, with a crescent-like blade.

Objects.Name: mace fire
Objects.Description: Still hot from the forge, a mace burns a black space on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The barbed head of the mace is still hot from the forge, and crafted to looklike the rising spikes of flames.

Objects.Name: staff rock crystal
Objects.Description: A staff crowned with a cloudy crystal is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A slender staff, carved from ash and embedded with a cloudy crystal at thehead.

Objects.Name: shield black sandstone
Objects.Description: A dark sandstone plate is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Molded from local black cliff sandstone and laquered with a special varnishfor strength, this makes a sturdy shield.

Objects.Name: tunic golden guard
Objects.Description: A tunic of dark gold is crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The guard's tunic is made of a sturdy, canvas-like material.

Objects.Name: boots black
Objects.Description: A pair of sturdy black boots lie scattered on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They are made from heavy black leather, and make a small clump-clump soundwhen walking in them.

Objects.Name: sword broadsword silver
Objects.Description: A silver, straight-edge sword has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a silver sword with a straight, tapering blade, forged by the townmagicians from the cliff metal and winds for the guards that defend the city.

Objects.Name: marbles set
Objects.Description: Red, purple and black marbles are set up in a circular game.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Twenty-two marbles of red, purple and black comprise a set used commonly forgames such as 'Lick the dragon', 'Addiction' and 'Dodge the imp', popular amonghuman youths.  Set on the ground, the rolling marbles become slippery.

Objects.Name: chess board set glass
Objects.Description: A black and rose glass chessboard is set up in mid-game.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The board and pieces are carved from black and light rose glass.  It's hardto say who is winning, but the sacrifices are high.

Objects.Name: ribbon velvet
Objects.Description: A dark velvet ribbon is coiled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a ribbon of soft dark velvet of finest quality..  Whoever's this is isprobably a rich merchant's daughter or the like.

Objects.Name: dagger shattered
Objects.Description: Something that used to be a dagger has been abandoned here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Some poor fool tried to fight something ten times his strength, and was luckyto get out with his life.  You see his dagger didn't make it.  The thin blade isshattered to splinters.

Objects.Name: curse luck ill
Objects.Description: You sense something unlucky about this room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You think you can see a curse?  You sense its evil presence all around you.

Objects.Name: gallows platform death
Objects.Description: The gallows platform rises ominously before you.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A sturdy wooden platform rises above the black sand road, with plenty of roomaround it for spectators.  On it are two means to death, the shackles forbeheading and the oak planking holding the noose for hanging.  The entiresurface is bespeckled with dried blood.

Objects.Name: fountain cracked drink
Objects.Description: A cracked stone fountain holds a supply of mossy-green water.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The circular fountain was etched from stone eons ago, and is worn and crackedfrom the weather.  Thick moss grows along its inside walls, reflecting its poormaintanance.

Objects.Name: altar amber
Objects.Description: An altar of dark amber stands here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The altar is waist-high, with a stand of black oak and a top of dark amber.There is a single black candle burning in a silver holder resting on it.

Objects.Name: cleaver meat
Objects.Description: A large meat cleaver is stuck in the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is wide and sharp, the blade's edge stained a dark red.

Objects.Name: amber stone gem
Objects.Description: An amber stone glints dully in the light.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a hunk of amber stone in excellent condition, and possibly worth alittle gold.

Objects.Name: amethyst violet gem
Objects.Description: An amethyst of pure violet glints from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a beautiful amethyst in excellent condition, and possibly worth somegold.

Objects.Name: diamond gem
Objects.Description: A small diamond twinkles from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You see a tiny diamond in excellent condition, and likely worth some gold.

Objects.Name: sunstone golden gem
Objects.Description: A golden sunstone shines with a celestial glow.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The golden sunstone is very pretty to look at, but is probably worth morethan the hand that carries it.

Objects.Name: necklace tiger eye eyes
Objects.Description: A gold and brown necklace lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Small but delightful to the eye.  Golden and brown bands shimmer from thestones as the necklace is turned in the light.

Objects.Name: ring agate black
Objects.Description: A black agate ring lies half-buried on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The agate is an opaque black and set in a ring of silver.

Objects.Name: shard obsidian gem
Objects.Description: A black, white-flecked shard is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a pointed shard of obsidian flecked with white cloud-like patterns.

Objects.Name: suit chain mail
Objects.Description: A heap of chain mail is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The silvery chain mail looks sturdy and close-fitting.

Objects.Name: helm bright
Objects.Description: A bright helm has been left nearby.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The helm is small and brightly silver-colored.  Fitting snugly on the head,it impairs your hearing slightly, but the protection seems a worthwhilesacrifice.

Objects.Name: bracers silver
Objects.Description: A pair of silver bracers is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They extend from elbow to wrist, and are forged from bright silver.

Objects.Name: boots sharp
Objects.Description: A pair of boots with razor-sharp toes is sitting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The knee-height black boots are fashioned with a razor-sharp point at eachtoe, delivering a more wicked kick, and kind of a nice tapdance, in fact.

Objects.Name: shield scale
Objects.Description: A shield of the scales of an unknown creature is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's a large, thin shield fashioned of the scales of an old creature youdon't recognize.  You wonder if the maker did.

Objects.Name: water skin waterskin water
Objects.Description: A waterskin has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It seems to be stiched together from some kind of small animal hide, probablysomething plentiful..  Mouse?  Rat?  Mole?  The water looks safe, however.

Objects.Name: chair lounger black
Objects.Description: A black lounger chair looks very relaxing.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The black naga-hide chair eases back by the use of a lever on the side, andlooks luxuriously comfortable.  Perfect for hanging out on, waiting for thebounty hunters to give up.  (Theoretically.  )

Objects.Name: magazine rogue book bartending
Objects.Description: A magazine is lying open on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You flip through it.  It appears to contain various recipes for poisons..From minor irritations to fatal, soul-stealing tinctures....  Yet, most of thescrawlings are spattered with blood and blurred with time.  Only in Exile wouldthese components be useful - you are doubtful you could find such ingrediantshere.

Objects.Name: sword gilded fencing
Objects.Description: A beautiful gilded sword lies at your feet.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The silvery sword is slender and light, suitable for fencing manuevers.  Thehilt is gilded with the purest gold from the treasury of nobility.

Objects.Name: scabbard silver
Objects.Description: A scabbard of bright silver lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is crafted to fit a long, slender type of sword, perhaps a foil.  Theedges are faintly gilded in gold, and one side engraved with the seal of a noblehouse.

Objects.Name: sword stone
Objects.Description: A short sword with a hilt of finished stone has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is rather crudely made, it must be acknowledged.  The use of stone inweaponry has fallen out of fashion, since the weight allows only the clumsiermanuevers.

Objects.Name: notice sign disclaimer
Objects.Description: A notice is posted on the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A neat type in black stencil gives the warning, "No Guaranteed Satisfaction."

Objects.Name: mutton leg meat food
Objects.Description: A leg of mutton is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The meat is thick and juicy, still red with the blood of the beast.

Objects.Name: heart boar food
Objects.Description: A heart is lying in a pool of blood.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A human delicacy.  And well worth its reputation for inspiring courage...Or at least gall.

Objects.Name: wings bowl dragon food
Objects.ShortDescription: a bowl of little dragon wings
Objects.Description: A bowl of tasty dragon wings is resting here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Cruelly harvested from the backs of young dragons, the leathery wings aretasty, and diaphanous as strands of silk or rain.

Objects.Name: sandwich troll grilled food
Objects.Description: A hot sandwich with a putrid odor is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Fingers and ribs grilled to a saucy roast poke out from between two slices ofcoarse rye bread.

Objects.Name: key black gold sundhaven
Objects.Description: A key fashioned of black and gold metal is lying in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: On the handle the words are engraved, "City of the Cliffs, gates freed, Notrust guaranteed"

Objects.Name: doll voodoo hex
Objects.Description: A corn straw doll is lying in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small corn husk doll is stitched with irregular, uneven lines, giving itan eerie appearance.  A shiver runs through you as you realize it is slightlywarm to the touch.

Objects.Name: lock hair red mercy
Objects.Description: A lock of red hair is lying coiled on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A long lock of straight red hair is coiled round your fingers.

Objects.Name: sword black watch
Objects.ShortDescription: a sword of the Black Watch
Objects.Description: A beautiful black sword emblazoned with a triskelion lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sword is beautifully crafted in order to serve the elite members of theBlack Watch of Sundhaven, charged with the work of keeping the town clean fromill-meaning rogues and killers.

Objects.Name: blade iron
Objects.Description: A short iron blade has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The hilt of the short iron blade is still warm from the hand of the eliteguardsman to whom it once belonged.

Objects.Name: plate steel black
Objects.Description: A black breast plate is lying face up.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The breast plate seems to be forged from some sort of black iron, and isquite sturdy.

Objects.Name: cloak gold black
Objects.ShortDescription: a handsome black and gold cloak
Objects.Description: A handsome black and gold cloak is folded on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The flowing knee length cloak is fashioned from wool and chased in goldcorded thread.

Objects.Name: whisky scotch glass whisky
Objects.Description: A tall glass of scotch is sitting nearby.
Objects.ExtraDescription: _______   |     |-   |.....| \        The warrior's drink of choice.   |     | /   |     |-                Okay, one of them.   -------  It appears the Lord of the Watch favored this one very much,since it is empty.

Objects.Name: skirt gypsy red
Objects.Description: A patchwork of red and purple lies on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The patched skirt is a sturdy cross-stitching of bright red and violet.

Objects.Name: blouse shirt red blood
Objects.Description: A dark red blouse is crumpled here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The gypsy blouse is of a rugged muslin fabric, rough and somewhat dirty, butin decent shape.

Objects.Name: violin old
Objects.Description: An old violin has been tossed in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The instrument seems to have seen some rough times.  The gypsies range farand wide...  However, it still holds together enough to play a tune, even blocka blow or two.

Objects.Name: mushroom white food pc
Objects.Description: A mushroom with white spots is growing in the water.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mushroom is short with a wide, pale-spotted umbrella.  It emits a toxicfume.

Objects.Name: blossom flower hibiscus red pc
Objects.Description: A lovely red hibiscus flower is lying here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The large wine-red flower emits a delightful smell, and is rumored to beexcellent for tea, and some other more toxic uses.

Objects.Name: eye toad
Objects.Description: A small slimy eye stares up at you from the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: All life has left the eye that stares blankly into space.  However, toad'seyes are rumored to be excellent in the manufacture of toxic substances.

Objects.Name: mortar pestle pc
Objects.Description: A mortar and pestle of black marble sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A bowl-shaped mortar carved from black marble holds a small blunt pestle.It looks like the perfect container to mash up something toxic in.

Objects.Name: tunic red dusty
Objects.Description: A dusty pile of red canvas is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tunic is frayed and layered with the dust of the road from many leaguesof travel.

Objects.Name: tray goodies
Objects.Description: A tray of goodies sits invitingly on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A thin, worn cloth of blue drapes over a polished wooden tray.  Thoughcovered with the dust of winding roads, several goods of exotic make are lainout that appeal.

Objects.Name: pipe wooden
Objects.Description: An old wooden pipe sits in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The pipe is cracked with age and filled with tobacco half-smoked intocharcoal.

Objects.Name: candle candlestick black light
Objects.Description: A black candlestick glows with a dim light.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A slim dark taper rises from a circular brass holder.

Objects.Name: incense stick light
Objects.Description: A plume of smoke drifts from an incense stick in the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small glowing ember shows atop a stick of a grainy substance.  It smells ofsome strong herbs grown beyond the lands you have known.

Objects.Name: honey jar food
Objects.Description: Flies are buzzing round a honey jar on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The small, blue and brown ornamented jar is cracked slightly and drippingwith a sticky golden substance.
